title: History of Idaho
description: This timeline was build mainly from events in the tabular timeline at the Idaho State Historical Society.

events.title: Smallpox Strikes the Shoshone
events.description: Shoshone bands obtain horses for transportation but are decimated by smallpox spread from European sources.

events.title: Indian/European Trading
events.description: Early historic Indian culture, with adaptation brought on by white contact, trade goods, and other fur-trade activities is represented across the state.

events.title: Louisiana Purchase
events.description: The United States purchases Louisiana Territory.
